bibl.title: Bulletin of Online Emendations to Papyri [BOEP]. Version 8.1 (March 14, 2019).
bibl.note: Emendations appearing in this bulletin have been entered online at www.papyri.info/editor/ via the Papyrological Editor (PE), and have been vetted by members of the PE's editorial board. The list contains corrections [by I. Andorlini, R. Ast, T. Backhuys, L. Berkes, F. Bertonazzi, L.M. Bortolani, J. Bromberg, S. Causo, R. Cavalli, W.G. Claytor, F. Corazza, T. Coughlan, J.M.S. Cowey, M. Dospël, M.G. Elmaghrabi, M. Gerhardt, N. Gonis, P. Heilporn, D. Kaltsas, N. Litinas, J. Lougovaya, M. Moser, F. Reiter, M. Resel, M. Sampson, J.V. Stolk, L. Vanderheyden] that were adopted between March 30, 2018 and March 14, 2019.
bibl.seg: Rodney Ast, Lajos Berkes, James M.S. Cowey, Holger Essler & Julia Lougovaya (edd.), Bulletin of Online Emendations to Papyri [BOEP]. Version 8.1 (March 14, 2019).
Heidelberg, Ruprecht-Karls-Universität Heidelberg, Institut für Papyrologie, 2019, 4 pp.

Emendations appearing in this bulletin have been entered online at www.papyri.info/editor/ via the Papyrological Editor (PE), and have been vetted by members of the PE's editorial board. The list contains corrections [by I. Andorlini, R. Ast, T. Backhuys, L. Berkes, F. Bertonazzi, L.M. Bortolani, J. Bromberg, S. Causo, R. Cavalli, W.G. Claytor, F. Corazza, T. Coughlan, J.M.S. Cowey, M. Dospël, M.G. Elmaghrabi, M. Gerhardt, N. Gonis, P. Heilporn, D. Kaltsas, N. Litinas, J. Lougovaya, M. Moser, F. Reiter, M. Resel, M. Sampson, J.V. Stolk, L. Vanderheyden] that were adopted between March 30, 2018 and March 14, 2019.

Ast Berkes Cowey Essler Lougovaya Andorlini Backhuys Bertonazzi Bortolani Bromberg Causo Cavalli Claytor Corazza Coughlan Dospël Elmaghrabi Gerhardt Gonis Heilporn Kaltsas Litinas Moser Reiter Resel Sampson Stolk Vanderheyden
